title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
EB: When I preview the report and click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button, I expect to see the default values displayed in the value boxes. This would allow me to easily modify the parameter I want to change. However, in the actual result, all the values are empty in the 'Enter Parameters' dialog. I only wanted to modify one parameter, but I am required to input all the values.
SR: To reproduce this bug: 1. Create several report parameters and set default values for them. 2. Drag the parameters to the layout. 3. Preview the report and click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
